trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST021_00095_SEQ_00<tab>Eadbert is testing adventurers by asking them to slay midge swarms.
TEXT_SUBFST021_00095_SEQ_01<tab>To prove your ability and earn Eadbert's trust, slay six midge swarms.
TEXT_SUBFST021_00095_SEQ_02<tab>As requested, you have slain six midge swarms and brought a measure of peace to the area in so doing. Bear word of your deeds to Eadbert in Hyrstmill.
TEXT_SUBFST021_00095_SEQ_03<tab>You return safely to Hyrstmill and tell Eadbert of your deeds. Duly convinced of your worth, he declares that he has further need of your services.

TEXT_SUBFST021_00095_EADBERT_000_2<tab>It's my sworn duty to keep the peace in Hyrstmill an' protect her from them as would do her people harm. If ye mean to stay for a spell, ye'll have to prove ye can be trusted.

TEXT_SUBFST021_00095_EADBERT_000_3<tab>Ours ain't a large community, an' we've hardly any fightin' folk, so there's always a need for battle-savvy types, what with all the beasties lurkin' hereabouts.

TEXT_SUBFST021_00095_EADBERT_000_4<tab>As it happens, we've been sufferin' from an outbreak of midges of late. The buggers're drivin' our patrols to distraction. Now, if ye were to exterminate, say, half a dozen swarms, we'd know ye for a friend.
TEXT_SUBFST021_00095_EADBERT_000_10<tab>Ye've done us a kindness an' proven yerself capable besides. Take this with Hyrstmill's thanks.
TEXT_SUBFST021_00095_EADBERT_000_11<tab>Oh! Afore ye go, I've thought of somethin' else ye could do for us...
